channel.title: 零零散散
channel.description: Recent content on 零零散散

item.title: wuliu项目
item.description:
Contents
  • 1. 表关系

1. 表关系

zh_asphalt_storage 沥青的入库通知单 zh_asphalt_storage_count 沥青的入库数量 zh_storage_in_notice 沥青入库通知单

ALTER TABLE zh_sub_plan_launch ADD COLUMN reservoir_code VARCHAR(255) NULL COMMENT '所属库区' AFTER create_date;

ALTER TABLE zh_sub_plan ADD COLUMN reservoir_code VARCHAR(255) NULL COMMENT '所属库区' AFTER create_date;

ALTER TABLE zh_plan_launch ADD COLUMN user_id VARCHAR(50) NULL COMMENT '登录人' AFTER plan_memo;

ALTER TABLE zh_plan CHANGE table_date table_date DATETIME NULL, CHANGE release_time release_time DATETIME NULL, CHANGE check_time check_time DATETIME NULL, CHANGE change_date change_date DATETIME NULL COMMENT '变更时间';

ALTER TABLE zh_sub_plan CHANGE plan_date plan_date DATE NULL;

ALTER TABLE zh_plan ADD COLUMN user_id VARCHAR(20) NULL COMMENT '登陆人' AFTER plan_memo;

ALTER TABLE wuliu2.zh_asphalt_storage ADD COLUMN category VARCHAR(50) NULL COMMENT '类目' AFTER Name_commodity;

ALTER TABLE wuliu.zh_out_bound_order ADD COLUMN category VARCHAR(20) NULL COMMENT '类目' AFTER out_date;

ALTER TABLE wuliu.zh_material_outbound ADD COLUMN goods_name VARCHAR(30) NULL COMMENT '商品名称' AFTER out_date;

  • 计划调度管理

    • 计划调度指令

      WebRoot/web/plandispatch/planinstructions/plan.jsp

    • 添加

      WebRoot/web/plandispatch/planinstructions/plan_add.jsp
/plandispatch/planInstructions!addStorageNotice.action

  • 合同管理(zh_contract_info)

    • 采购合同管理

      WebRoot/web/contractmanagement/purchasercontract/purchase_contractinfo.jsp

提货通知单(zh_storage_out_notice)

  • 计划调度管理

    • 发货计划整合

      WebRoot/web/plandispatch/deliveryplan/delivery_plan.jsp

  • 发货申请审批

    WebRoot/web/sendoutgoodscheck/sendgoods_check_manage.jsp
/sendgoodscheckaction/sendgoodscheck!findSendGoodsCheckData.action
zh_send_goods_check

  • 仓储管理

    • 库存

      • 库存结余调整信息(zh_balance_table)

        WebRoot/web/storagemanagement/repertory/repertorysurplus/repertory_surplus.jsp
/zhbalancetable/zhBalanceTableAction!queryAll.action

  • 合同管理(zh_contract_info)

    contractInfo/contract!queryContractInfoForPage.action
POST /task?id=1 HTTP/1.1
Host: example.org
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: 137

{
  "status": "ok",
  "extended": true,
  "results": [
    {"value": 0, "type": "int64"},
    {"value": 1.0e+3, "type": "decimal"}
  ]
}

if (ObjUtils.notEmpty(contractCode)) { whereStr.append(" and s.contract_code = '" + contractCode.trim() + "'"); } else if (ObjUtils.notEmpty(projectName)) { whereStr.append(" and s.project_name = '" + projectName.trim() + "'"); }else { whereStr.append(" and c.execute_state<>'03' or c.execute_state is null order by c.create_date desc"); }

QueryResult queryResult = sendGoodsCheckService.findContractSellData(whereStr.toString(), iQuery); this.write(queryResult);
